note:
OUR COMMON GROUND :: Alternative :: Progressive LIVE Black Public Discourse since 1985. "Transforming Truth to Power, One Broadcast At a Time"
Producers of TruthWorks Network. Janice is a pioneer in the movement to offer terrestrial and internet platforms targeted solely to Black audiences. OCG for many years has hosted leading-edge Black thought leaders, authors, scholars, and activists, formulating transformative ideas and solutions that empower Black America.

fields.name: Website
